channel.title: python, hiring on Og Maciel's Journal
channel.description: Recent content in python, hiring on Og Maciel's Journal

item.title: Hiring is Tough!
item.description: So I've been trying to hire two python developers to join my automation team here at Red Hat since last November, 2013... and believe it or not, so far I've had absolutely zero success in finding good, strong, with real world experience candidates in North Carolina! I either find really smart people, who do have relevant backgrounds or could 'hit the ground running' but are way out of my current budget, or they lack real world experience and fall into more of an entry level position.
